TEXT.TITLE: TRAVELERS <TIC> TO REPURCHASE STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Travelers Corp said will repurchase up to 2.5 mln shares ot its common stock. The company, which has 100.2 mln shares outstanding, said its stock is at an attractive price at the moment. Reuter
